synopsis.text: This anime is a propaganda film that utilizes the classic Japanese folklore character Momotaro. It depicts Momotaro leading an animal fleet to attack Pearl Harbor, referred to as "Demon Island." Momotaro sends his animal companions, including Canine, Monkey, and Pheasant units, on aircraft to bomb the ships stationed at Pearl Harbor. The animation mixes real video footage of the Pearl Harbor attack with animated sequences. Characters defending Pearl Harbor bear resemblance to Popeye characters Bluto and Olive Oyl. This stylistic choice seems to portray the conflict as one between Japanese folk heroes and American cartoon characters. As Japan's first animated feature film production, this short seeks to boost morale and present the Pearl Harbor attack as an honorable mission accomplished by Momotaro and his loyal animal followers. The integration of folklore and animation serves nationalistic propaganda purposes during wartime.
